design.resource:
<style>
.nav > .active{
    background-color:#dddddd !important;
}
    
.nav > .link-disabled > a{
    color: #aaaaaa !important;
    cursor : not-allowed !important
}
.nav > .active > a {
    color:#205c90 !important;
}
</style>

<tal:defs tal:on-error="context/handleError" tal:define="doc python:context.REQUEST.PARENTS[0];
    wfData python: doc.restrictedTraverse('@@wfWizardInfo')();
">

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"tal:content="structure string:
    var wfdata = ${wfData};

    
"></script></tal:defs>
